MAP_API_LOAD_FAILURE_MESSAGE: The maps feature requires an internet connection. Please make sure your connection is working properly and try again.
MAP_API_INIT_FAILURE_MESSAGE: The maps engine has been loaded, but failed to initialize properly. Please, check if valid Google API Key is set in Settings > Controller section.
MAP_API_WEB_GL_NOT_SUPPORTED_MESSAGE: WebGL support is required in order to use Designer Maps. Please check your browser compatibility and requirements. Also note that WebGL support is dependent on GPU support and may not be available on older devices, or may require video drivers update.
MAP_API_KEY_NOT_DEFINED_MESSAGE:
In order to use Google Maps a valid Google Maps API key is required. For details on obtaining a key please see this guide.

Once you have a key please make sure that it's defined in the Settings > Controller section.
MAP_EDIT_API_KEY_NOT_DEFINED_MESSAGE:
In order to use Google Maps a valid Google Maps API key is required. For details on obtaining a key please see this guide.

Once you have a key please make sure that it's defined in the Settings > Controller section.
NO_MAPS_DEFINED_MESSAGE: Please create a new map in order to use this feature.
MAP_IMAGE_LOAD_FAILURE_MESSAGE: Failed to load the image map; the image may be corrupted.
MAP_SELECT_DROPDOWN_SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Select or search for a map
MAP_SELECT_DROPDOWN_TABLE_EMPTY: No matching maps are available at this time.
MAP_FEATURE_COVERAGE_RECEIVER_SENSITIVIT: Adjust receiver (station) sensitivity to get more accurate coverage results.
MAP_GOOGLE_SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search by address, place, or coordinates
MAP_UNPLACED_DEVICES_EMPTY_NO_MATCHES: No devices match that search criteria.
MAP_UNPLACED_DEVICES_VIRTUAL_DEVICES_HIN: Presented coverage is approximated and may depend on device configuration and country limitations.
MAP_DEVICE_PLACE_FAILED: There was an error saving device coordinates
MAP_CONFIGURE_DELETE_CONFIRM: Do you really want to delete map "{{mapName}}"?
MAP_EDIT_IMAGE_LABEL_HINT: Upload an image file from disk to use it as a map background.
MAP_EDIT_IMAGE_SELECT_DIFFERENT_LABEL: Not what you were looking for?
MAP_EDIT_IMAGE_ERROR: The selected file is either broken or of unsupported type.
MAP_EDIT_KEEP_DEVICES_TOOLTIP: Please note that device coordinates may become incorrect and repositioning may be required.
MAP_EDIT_RESIZE_IMAGE_TOOLTIP: Automatically reduce size of a large image for better performance.
MAP_EDIT_SAVE_CONFIRM: Do you really want to save changes?
MAP_EDIT_SAVE_ERROR: There was an error saving the map changes. Please try again later.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_DISABLED_TOOLTIP: There are no wireless devices on the map
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_ERROR_UNKNOWN: An error occurred when calculating auto-channels. Try again later.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SAVE_SUCCESS: Channel changes have been successfully applied.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SAVE_ERROR: An error occurred when applying channel changes.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_USE_COORDINATES: Use the placement of devices on the map
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SCAN_RECOMMENDED_DESCR: Some of the access points on the map may not have most recent neighboring scan results. In order to calculate optimal channel plan, it is recommended to run the neighboring scan.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SCAN_IN_PROGRESS_DESCR: A neighboring access point scan is in progress. It is recommended to wait for the scan to finish.
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SCAN_FINISHED: Neighboring access points scan successfully finished
MAP_AUTO_CHANNELS_SCAN_START_ERROR: Neighboring access points scan cannot be started at this moment. Try again later.
MAP_SCALE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a line by clicking and dragging. Then define the distance of the line below.
TOPOLOGY_NO_USG_MESSAGE: Please connect a UniFi Security Gateway to enable the Topology View.
ADD_WALLS_DESCRIPTION: Select type of the wall, then start drawing on the map. Hit ESC to end.
